text: seongseoui baegseongdeul jung-eneun cheongeum eul bogwanhayeodo geugeos-eul dollyeojuneun muliga issgo tto geudeul jung-eneun iljeon-eul bogwanhayeodo yoguhaji anihamyeondollyeojuji anhneun muliga issdeola geu ligoseo geudeul-eun geugeos-e daehae uli neun munmaeng-indeul-e daehan uimuga eobsdo da lago malhani geudeul-eun hananim-e daehae geojismal-eul hago iss-eum-eul jal algo issnola
